metadata.title: CVE-2019-19963 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in wolfSSL before 4.3.0 in a non-defaultconfiguration where DSA is enabled. DSA signing uses the BEEA algorithmduring modular inversion of the nonce, leading to a side-channel attackagainst the nonce.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
